author: Meaghan Dorman
description: Tiki meets the aperitivo/digestivo in this sweet 'n' sour almond daiquiri. Like other daiquiris, this cocktail benefits from dilution so, hence the serve over crushed ice. (Add a splash of water to the recipe if serving on-the-rocks.)
name: Across the Pacific
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
